info.name: WAHA - WhatsApp HTTP API - 2024.8
info.description:
WhatsApp HTTP API that you can run in a click!

Learn more:
  • Documentation
  • Supported features in engines
  • GitHub - WAHA Core
  • GitHub - WAHA Plus
  • NEW! - WAHA Dashboard
  • NEW! - WAHA Dashboard Documentation

Support the project and get WAHA Plus version!

  • WAHA Plus
  • Patreon
  • Boosty
  • Patron Portal

variable.description: (Required) WhatsApp session name
The protocol used to access the server. (This can only be one of http,https)
The hostname or IP address of the server.
The port number on which the server is listening for requests
The base URL path for all API endpoints. This can be used to group related endpoints together under a common path.
